artiste: Dinh Q. Lê, Hai Quoc Tran, Le Van Danh, Phu-Nam Thuc Ha, Tuan Andrew Nguyen
artisteBio: Vietnamese American, born 1968, Vietnamese, born 1960, Vietnamese, born 1965, French–Vietnamese, born 1974, Vietnamese–American, born 1976
title: The Farmers and The Helicopters
